mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Movie( rating, title, genre, open_date, grade, runningtime,director,actor,content,image) VALUES( #{rating}, #{title}, #{genre}, #{openDate}, #{grade}, #{runningtime}, #{director}, #{actor}, #{content}, #{image});
mapper.select: SELECT movie_seq AS movieSeq, rating, title, genre, open_date AS openDate, grade, runningtime,director,actor,content,image FROM Movie ORDER BY rating DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{end}
SELECT movie_seq AS movieSeq, rating, title, genre, open_date AS openDate, grade, runningtime,director,actor,content,image FROM Movie WHERE ${title} LIKE CONCAT('%',#{title},'%')

SELECT movie_seq AS movieSeq, rating, title, genre, open_date AS openDate, grade, runningtime,director,actor,content,image FROM Movie WHERE ${keyField} LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWord},'%') ORDER BY rating DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{end}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Movie WHERE ${keyField} LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWord},'%')
mapper.update: UPDATE Movie SET rating=#{rating}, title=#{title}, genre=#{genre}, open_date=#{openDate}, grade=#{grade}, runningtime=#{runningtime},director=#{director},actor=#{actor},content=#{content},image=#{image} WHERE movie_seq = #{movieSeq}
